attributes.action: Use the MOD to deliver fuel to stop fuel supply issues
attributes.additional_details: Tell the MOD to step in, they are on standby anyway and have had a plan in place ready since the 2000 fuel shortages. Its vitally important to initiated this and stop the country having fuel supply issues.
attributes.background: The MOD should immediately start delivering fuel to fuel stations to enable the country to keep running. Currently shortages in hgv drivers and panic buying incited by press coverage means essential workers are not able to provide all care for example due to carers needing fuel.
